register.reg_long_name: OS Lock Data Transfer Register, Transmit

purpose_text.para: Used for save/restore of DBGDTRTX_EL0. It is a component of the Debug Communications Channel.

field_description.para: Reads of this register return the value in DTRTX and do not change TXfull.
Writes of this register update the value in DTRTX and do not change TXfull.
For the full behavior of the Debug Communications Channel, see .

access_permission_text.para: Arm deprecates reads and writes of OSDTRTX_EL1 when the OS Lock is unlocked.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
